when.test: item_name!='' and item_name2!='' and item_name3!='' and item_name4!='' and item_name5!='' and item_name6!=''
item_name!='' and item_name2!='' and item_name3!='' and item_name4!='' and item_name5!=''
item_name!='' and item_name2!='' and item_name3!='' and item_name4!=''

mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from trade_order_by_view where item_name = #{ item_name }
select * from ( select rank() over(order by item_idx desc) as no, i.* from (select * from trade_order_by_view) i ) where no between #{ start } and #{ end }
select item_o1 as option_name1 from options
select * from trade_order_by_view where item_name = #{ name }
select * from trade_search_by_view where item_name = #{ item_name }
